content: this is my contribution to the bamcal 2025 and an homage to early spring flowers i combined different flowers for you lesser celandine daisy tulip dandelion flowers that mean spring for me the result is a big new flower or if you want to say so- a flower bouquet i did not use the original colours as in the bamcal we all use our unique ones so feel free to use whatever you want if you want to use the colours the plants really have lesser celandine is yellow daisy white and yellow tulip exists in many ways and dandelion seeds are light brown but it s not necessary at all the only thing you have to take care is not to fo when i say so as some effects need more than one round the pattern contains 22 rounds which is quite a big amount and it looks very complex but please don t fear- most of the time i used basic stitches and many of the rounds are so easy and repetet that i even decided not to provide a stitch count in these rounds pattern uses u s terms pdf can be found here flower bouquet 1 1 https //padlet com/alexandrazaminer1/crochet-patterns-ayn4uaegwde4a7oo
